definition: evening show (at theater etc)
evening/night/late
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: We can see the late show.
How often do you watch the late movie?
sentences.chinese: 你多久看一次晚場電影？

sentences.english: The theater is booked up for every evening this week except Friday.
sentences.chinese: 除了星期五外，這個劇院本週的晚場票都預定完了。

sentences.english: An evening show was arranged to admit free the family members of the workers.
sentences.chinese: 安排了一個晚場免費招待工人家屬。
